fightwithtwist: ^You finish the fight with your unexpected ally. He looks happy but tired. You see him walking towards the counter, ordering another round of ale.
afterthefight: ^Sitting near the counter, the barkeep gives you a bowl of stew.
^"It's on the house. Eat; you'll feel better."
^After finishing, a blonde man sits next to you.
^"I know how to take care of myself."
FriendlyResponse: ^"Anyway, they're dealt with. By the way, my name is Gary. Haven't seen you around. Are you from here? I can show you around."
^You both get up and leave the tavern.
